name: Ballmania
overview: In this simple Avoid-it style game by Amok Developments (represented by Oliver Malms, Doug Roberts, and Thomas Mogensen) you try to dodge and weave and take your ball through this sector of space without touching any of the balls flying right at you! Published in Italy as Recrudew in both Super C64 e C128 n.52 (gennaio 1991) and Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - 100 games (1992).
